name: (UN)natural selection
description:
You're a scientist in the reasearcher group. You're studying a new microorganism species that has recently been discovered, the Hgughs. 

You, as a genetics specialist, will work with 4 subjects in study for each generation. Every time you'll be in charge of choosing 2 of those 4 subjects, so the next generation inherits part of their stats.

Obviously, since they're living organisms, they might get ill or suffer on some major issues, that might cause them to die before they reproduce. 

Try to get as more generations as you can!

If the in-browser game doesn't run, you can download the game. It's my first time building for WebGL and I don't know if I messed up something xD

This game was made for the Trijam 122, which got the themes Transformation and Micro things.

My approach is to get a microorganism species to evolve (to transform) with the best stats as possible. The game took more than 3 hours to complete (probably 6 or 7). Everything was made by myself. 

Additional

If you're reading this, thanks if you already played my game, and would be really cool to see some comments from you! It's been really fun to work in this game!
